bug.author: dashesy
bug.summary: Double-click no longer opens the onnx file
bug.description:
Netron app and version: 4.4.6 OS and browser version: Windows, Edge
this used to work in all the previous versions, now it opens Netron but does not load the model Steps to Reproduce:
Double click on onnx file from explorer
Please attach or link model files to reproduce the issue if necessary.

comments.comment: Thank you, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lutzroeder>@lutzroeder</denchmark-link> , for this awesome tool!
and thanks for such quick fix!
